title: Stage Lv4-A6-S23
description: Level 4 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: It's important to adapt to change. (business variant 1)
We will transition to a new system. (business variant 1)
learning_points: Level 4 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: It's important to adapt to change. (business variant 1)
We will transition to a new system. (business variant 1)
We need to respond with flexibility. (business variant 1)
Let's accept change as an opportunity. (business variant 1)
We will provide support during the adaptation process. (business variant 1)
We can develop through innovation. (business variant 1)
Let's grow by overcoming challenges. (business variant 1)
A change management plan is needed. (business variant 1)
We will introduce changes gradually. (business variant 1)
All team members need to participate in the change. (business variant 1)
